text:
Kettle | http://kettlenyc.com | ONSITE | Full-time in New York City & Sunnyvale, CA

Come work with us at Kettle, an independent digital agency.

We're currently looking to hire an iOS developer (Swift) to help us build on the first-generation app for a major athletic facility brand. We're also looking for JavaScript developers to help realize complex creative concepts for an iconic company.

Benefits include: Paid vacation (obviously), leisure benefit, commuter benefit, profit sharing, 401k match, generous healthcare, dental, and visionâ€”and most of all, an awesome team to work with and completely sane interviews.

All our current openings: http://kettlenyc.com/jobs

Feel free to reach out directly. I'm Jacob (jacob@...).
